title: About Me
text:
Chippy
Hello, I’m Chippy Marx, an emerging professional in the fields of ecosystem science and sustainability, and restoration ecology. I have specific interest in lab work and fire ecology, and am looking for an internship for summer of 2025.


My Background
I have experience in microbial research and genetics, GIS, and soil physics.
